full_summary:
**Title** {Mobile Information Kiosks}
===============

**Reference Number** {WS4625562253-Doc4653599939}
---------------

* **Amendment Number**: Amendment 2
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4625562253
* **Publication Date**: June 26, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 16, 2024, at 2 PM EST
* **Amendment Date**: July 2, 2024

**Contracting Authority**
----------------------

* **Contracting Authority Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Authority Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Notice Type and Method**
-------------------------

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

**Scope of Work**
----------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence, Edmonton Garrison, and Garrison Det. Wainwright, has a requirement for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RIOS) for the supply, delivery, and offloading of packaged sandwiches to designated locations on an as-and-when-requested basis for the period of the Standing Offer.

**Selection Criteria**
---------------------

* **Lowest Price**

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* **Contact Person**: Marsland, Rina (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: rina.marsland@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Attachments**
---------------

No attachments are provided.

**Notice URL**
--------------

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20138743?extsite=MjAxMzg3NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This rewritten entry excludes non-essential information, improves sentence structure, and uses professional terminology to make the announcement easier to read and understand. The **Title**, **Reference Number**, and other relevant headings help to organize the content.
